result = Razor.Parse<ABCTEMPLATE>(outer_html, abctemplate);

I am iterating all users in db and make a template to send an email to respective users, problem is, when they reach to 20,000 users they throw an exception below.

Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown at CompiledRazorTemplates.Dynamic.dcdddaebaee.Execute()
   at RazorEngine.Templating.TemplateBase.RazorEngine.Templating.ITemplate.Run(ExecuteContext context)
   at RazorEngine.Templating.TemplateService.Run(ITemplate template, DynamicViewBag viewBag)
   at RazorEngine.Templating.TemplateService.Parse(String razorTemplate, Object model, DynamicViewBag viewBag, String cacheName)
   at RazorEngine.Razor.Parse[T](String razorTemplate, T model)

I went through the google about and find out that razor cached template.
My question is why they cached a template and how can i get rid of this.
That should be template clear method to cleal cache.
